title: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
description: When the actual servlet is invoked, the DispatchType in the ServletRequestListener is incorrectly set to something other than ASYNC. If the listener is intended to be invoked for each dispatch, then the DispatcherType in the listener should match the value returned in the filter/servlet.
OB: The DispatchType in the ServletRequestListener is incorrectly set on async dispatch.
EB: The DispatchType in the ServletRequestListener should be set to ASYNC on async dispatch.
SR: Ensure that the DispatcherType in the ServletRequestListener is correctly set to ASYNC on async dispatch.
